text: The Setzer's mouse-tailed dormouse (Myomimus setzeri) is a species of dormouse in the Gliridae family. It is endemic to Iran. == Source == * Baillie J. 1996. Myomimus setzeri. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 30 July 2007. == Other websites == * EDGE of Existence page on Setzer's Mouse- tailed Dormouse Category:Myomimus Category:Mammals of Asia
title: Setzer's mouse-tailed dormouse
